page.title: 17HEALTH MEDICAL & DENTAL
page.content: Mr Bennie is our very popular school dentist. He has a dental unit in our playground and visits our school every Monday. A dental hygenist comes once every fortnight to check our teeth for plaque. Mr Bennie told us that most of us will have good teeth when we leave school, but in 15 years time, 3-12 out of the 31 in our class will have no teeth. Sometimes the school doctor and nurse give us a routine medical check- up. There is one doctor in Dornoch. He consults every day from 9 until 11am. There are several district nurses who visit sick and elderly people, also mothers and babies. You can buy many medicines at the chemist and he makes up the doctor's presciptions. There is a dental practice and chiropodist in Dornoch. The nearest hospital is in Golspie but often patients are sent to the better facilities in Inverness.
